## ComponentCustomOptions interface

Interface for declaring custom options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ComponentCustomOptions 
```

## Example


```ts
declare module '@vue/runtime-core' {
  interface ComponentCustomOptions {
    beforeRouteUpdate?(
      to: Route,
      from: Route,
      next: () => void
    ): void
  }
}

```
